<center>
Hello from Ho-ost! The holidays are approaching and we've cut our pricing way down once again! 

Our shared hosting plans come with cPanel & CloudLinux, Free SSL via LetsEncrypt or cPanel AutoSSL, Free Softaculous Auto Installer and Free CloudFlare Protection. A dedicated IPv4 is available in NY for a $2 monthly fee. 

Get a free domain when you order our 2nd and 3rd package! 



>**Shared-XX-1:**
>Host **1** Sites,
>**1GB SSD** Storage,
>**100GB Bandwidth**,
>
>$3/YEAR USE CODE **HOLIDAYS1** [Order New York, US](https://ho-ost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1) - [Order Manchester, UK](https://ho-ost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=47)
 >
>**Shared-XX-2:**
>Host **5** Sites,
>**5GB SSD** Storage,
>**500GB Bandwidth**,
>
>$10/YEAR USE CODE **HOLIDAYS2** [Order New York, US](https://ho-ost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=74) - [Order Manchester, UK ](https://ho-ost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=48)
>
>**Shared-XX-3:**
>Host **Unlimited** Sites,
>**10GB SSD** Storage,
>**1TB Bandwidth**,
>
>$25/YEAR USE CODE **HOLIDAYS3** [Order New York, US](https://ho-ost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=82) - [Order Manchester, UK ](https://ho-ost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=82)

Got questions? Great, we'd love to hear them. Open a support ticket and let us know what our Knowledge Base is missing, and we'll award you with $1 credit towards your first service. 

Tweet at Ho_ostcom or email us at hello@ho-ost.com
